ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Aeris}
You all get out
while you can.{PAUSE}It's not you they're after
it's me.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Barret}
I don't need no appointment
This is a 'mergency!{PAUSE}And anyone who don't wanna get their
face bashed in better git outta the way!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Barret}
Let's go to the top!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Barret}
*&^%(*
We're surrounded!{PAUSE}If I was alone this wouldn't be a thing, but
I gotta reputation to protect.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // {Barret}
Yeah, well that ain't happenin'.{PAUSE}You got caught up in this over Marlene.
Now, it's my turn to help you!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // {Barret}
Who you callin' Mr. {Barret}?
That don't sound right!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // {Barret}
Huh? Oh, oh yeah
You're cold, man.
Just like someone else 'round here I know.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:18}); // {Red XIII}
Did you say something?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:19}); // {Barret}
Notta thing.
So what're we gonna do?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // {Red XIII}
Well then{PAUSE}If you are through talking,
may I suggest that we think of
a way to get out of here.

ops.raw: d0 e9 f9 40 ff 00 00 ea f9 d6 ff 00 00

escape this way

I guess

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:32}); // Turtle's Paradise Newsletter
No. 2{PAUSE}The end of another hard day. Wouldn't you
like to sit back with a tall cool one?{PAUSE}You can at the Turtle's Paradise!!
Stop in today!{PAUSE}There's nothing like
a smooth one after work!

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:33}); // Shinra, Inc.
Our slogan is:{PAUSE}Shinra's Future Is
The World's Future!!{PAUSE}Mako Energy For A
Brighter World!!
